overview: In outrageous porn starlet Adira Allure, director Aiden Riley found a kindred spirit - an irrepressible provocateur bent on spreading filthy fun and splashing kinky sexuality (plus gushers of orgasmic squirt) in the world's face. Aiden compiles six of her wettest, freakiest adventures in "Anything For Adira," topping it off with a couple of bonus segments that have only appeared online!
title: Anything for Adira
